Interpreter

Table of contents

  • Description
  • Topics
  • Instructional materials
  • Documentation

Description

In this assignment, students will create an interpreter for a simple programming language. The interpreter will parse a file into a list of commands, and then execute the commands, using BRIDGES to create circles, polygons, and lines.

Topics

  • Command line arguments
  • Try and catch blocks
  • Reading files
  • StringBuilder class
  • String parsing
  • Arraylists
  • BRIDGES SymbolCollection API

Instructional materials

BRIDGES instructors: To access teacher files or solution files, use the Bridges_Users Shared Drive. If you do not already have access, please contact iuse-bridges-group@uncc.edu.
